document_data.name: ''Navril's History of the Parsnip''
document_data.author: [[Navril]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Navril's History of the Parsnip''''' was a common book dedicated to the history of [[parsnip]]s, a noble root vegetable, penned by [[Navril]] sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, the fortress library of [[Candlekeep]] had several copies of ''Navril's History of the Parsnip'' and many visitors continued bringing more copies as their entrance gifts. However, the library's [[monk]]s always rejected "old Navril" in favor of some regional collections of songs and [[minstrel]]s' sayings.
